content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All components are connected to mine and store coal

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) storing ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0) with inserters
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) storing processed plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belts and inserters connecting the components
- Full chest warning at (-5.5,-55.5) containing 800 iron ore

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving items between chests and furnaces

### Power Generation at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Connected pipe network
- Electric poles forming electricity network (id=5389)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract from empty or non-existent chests
- Verify chest exists and contains items before attempting extraction
- Check if you're targeting the correct chest position

### Errors related to inserter placement and operation
- Ensure inserters have proper pickup and drop positions
- Keep inserters fueled to maintain operation
- Check for full output chests blocking inserter operation

### Power system connection issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning - ensure proper pipe connections
- Boiler needs fuel to heat water
- Verify all power components are properly connected

### Mining operation issues
- Multiple mining drills show "out of fuel" warnings - ensure continuous fuel supply
- Monitor output chest capacity to prevent backups
- Ensure proper belt connections for material flow
